block.enchants_and_expeditions.altar.des: Allows for the placement of a tome in order to modify the attributes of the nearby Enchanting Table
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.bou: The blessed item is retained upon death
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.flu: Passively regenerates the wearer's health whilst submerged
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.inf: Striking a burning target increases damage dealt and burning time
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.tem: Worn equipment passively repairs itself whilst the wearer is on fire
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ven: The blessed weapon deals significantly increased damage whilst its wielder is low on health
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.con: The blessed Spear summons lightning after a successful charge attack during rain or storms
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.arc: Protects from magical and blast damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ele: Protects from fire, freeze and natural damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.phy: Protects from projectile and melee direct damage sources
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.smi: Lights struck targets on fire and deals increased damage to fire-susceptible foes, such as the undead
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.chi: Has a chance to freeze struck targets and deals increased damage to freeze-susceptible foes, such as arthropods
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.bla: Grants the wearer immunity and increased movement speed in fire
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.blo: The wielder regenerates health when dealing the final blow to a target
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ent: Randomly modifies the amount of damage dealt
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ext: Increases experience gained from mining certain blocks
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.ice: Increases movement speed whilst on ice
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.qui: Provides a burst of movement speed when the wearer eliminates an entity
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.rec: Allows wolves to passively regenerate health over time
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.vel: Increases the travel speed and accuracy of projectiles
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.jou: Successful charge attacks with a Spear whilst mounted grant a health and speed boost to the mount
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.sli: Nautiluses deflect incoming attacks whilst dashing
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.soa: Increases the flying speed of Happy Ghasts
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.fea: Provides Slow Falling on or falling from a Happy Ghast
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.equ: Attacks converts fire to freeze, or freeze to fire
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.fra: The cursed item has a chance to take increased durability damage when used
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.sha: Blocks mined with the cursed item have a chance to drop nothing when destroyed
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.dis: Taking damage displaces the wearer's active affects to the attacker
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.jus: When a Shield's blocking strength is overpowered, unleash a defensive shockwave
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.fro: Parrying an attack freezes the attacker
enchantment.enchants_and_expeditions.sco: Parrying an attack sets the attacker on fire
effect.enchants_and_expeditions.overheal: Boosts the health of the affected with temporary hearts
text.autoconfig.enchants_and_expeditions: The maximum amount of enchantments a singular item can have, excluding blessings & curses. Set to -1 to disable
Whether already-enchanted items should be enchantable multiple times at the Enchanting Table
Whether the rebalanced experience-per-level formula should be used, which includes more reasonable experience requirements beyond level 30
The chance of an anvil being damaged after use. The vanilla chance is 0.12
Whether experience bottles should be craftable with lapis lazuli. Enabling this will also make water bottles stackable to 64
Whether an improved item enchantment tooltip ordering system should be used, where blessings are placed at the top, enchantments in the middle, and curses at the bottom
Whether loot tables which do not specify an enchantment pool should default to #on_random_loot. It is recommended to keep this enabled
Whether Enchants and Expeditions should append loot tables with additional enchanted books
You can add enchantments to the #enchants_and_expeditions:disabled_enchantments tag in order to disable them
